verses.name: Job 10:17
verses.text: Thou renewest thy witnesses against me, and increasest thine indignation upon me; changes and war are against me.

verses.name: Job 10:18
verses.text: Wherefore then hast thou brought me forth out of the womb? Oh that I had given up the ghost, and no eye had seen me!

verses.name: Job 10:19
verses.text: I should have been as though I had not been; I should have been carried from the womb to the grave.

verses.name: Job 10:20
verses.text: Are not my days few? cease then, and let me alone, that I may take comfort a little,
